caption.title: Schematic illustration of the spatial SEIR model with mobile individuals in the square lattice.
caption.p:
The individuals randomly hops from site to site. Each of the susceptible (S), exposed (E), and recovered (R) individuals hops to one of the eight neighbouring sites with the hopping rate λ, while each of the infectious individuals (I) hops similarly with the rate
λα where 1− α represents the mobility reduction rate.
